greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients in asymptotic expansion of sequence A077607.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..126
Richard J. Martin, and Michael J. Kearney, Integral representation of certain combinatorial recurrences, Combinatorica: 35:3 (2015), 309-315.
mathematica: nmax = 30; b = CoefficientList[Assuming[Element[x, Reals], Series[x^4*E^(2/x)/(ExpIntegralEi[1/x] - x*E^(1/x))^2, {x, 0, nmax}]], x]; Flatten[{1, Table[Sum[b[[k+1]]*StirlingS2[n-1, k-1], {k, 1, n}], {n, 1, nmax}]}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 03 2015 *)
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 27 2015
